heading: 50 ways to spend a lot of money
subheading: burn, baby, burn. the object lust is getting irritating. the what-ifs are getting old. life is short, and the number on your paycheck is getting longer. so why not just get it over with? exercise your options. sell off your stocks. and go shopping. the millennium sticklers have long advanced their cold-blooded dither that the […]
author: david doty
